profile.name: Sompal Ahirwar
profile.headline: Aspiring Data Scientist | Machine Learning | NLP | AI Solutions
profile.summary: I’m passionate about solving real-world problems using data-driven approaches. I build end-to-end AI solutions across ML, NLP, and analytics — from data wrangling and modeling to deployment and dashboards.

about.para1: I'm pursuing an M.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering at Shri Krishna University (2024–2026). I enjoy turning data into insight and insight into action. My goal is to become a Data Scientist who builds impactful ML/NLP systems that improve products and user experiences.
about.para2: I’ve worked on projects ranging from chatbots and classification models to analytical dashboards. I care about code quality, reproducible workflows, and clear communication.

points: Conducted data analysis to discover insights and support decision-making.
Trained and evaluated NLP models for classification and automation tasks.
Developed dashboards to track KPIs and communicate results to stakeholders.
Collaborated in a team environment, contributing to end-to-end project delivery.

projects.title: WhatsApp Chatbot Assistant
projects.desc: AI assistant for a jewelry business using Flask, deployed on AWS EC2. Handles FAQs and customer interactions with NLP.

projects.title: Heart Disease Prediction
projects.desc: Binary classification using logistic regression and random forest to predict heart disease risk.

projects.title: Movie Genre Classification
projects.desc: NLP project with TF-IDF features and SVM for multi-class genre prediction.

projects.title: Email Spam Detection
projects.desc: End-to-end ML pipeline using decision trees and ensemble methods to classify spam vs ham.

certifications: Industrial Training at Bignalytics IT Solutions – Master's Program in AI & ML.
